subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Jürgen Klinsmann, the coach of the German national team, has silenced a swarm of critics by leading Germany to its best start in the World Cup in 36 years.
snippet: Jürgen Klinsmann, the coach of the German national team, has silenced a swarm of critics by leading Germany to its best start in the World Cup in 36 years.
